metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35376 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Xpdf 4.02 allows stack consumption because of an incorrect subroutine reference in a Type 1C font charstring, related to the FoFiType1C::getOp() function.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication poppler is affected ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
